About.Name: Tien Le
About.AboutText:
Hi, I am Tien Le. I am a passionate computer science student with a keen interest in software development and programming. Currently, I am pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University. I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in various areas of computer science, with a particular focus on C++ programming.

I enjoy tackling challenging programming projects and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute my expertise and learn from my peers.

Beyond the classroom, I actively engage in extracurricular activities related to computer science, including hackathons, coding competitions, and open-source contributions. I believe in the importance of continuous learning and seek out opportunities to explore new technologies and methodologies.

Experience.ExperienceText:
I am an international transfer student, and this is my first year at Seattle Pacific University (SPU). I started my college journey at Broward College in Vietnam, studying Software Development

I'm excited to be here and look forward to making the most of my time at SPU.

Project1.Title: Focus Critters App Project - System Proposal and System Specification
Project1.Desc:
Focus Critters is a mobile application designed to enhance focus, productivity, and engagement during study sessions through gamification and social interaction. This app integrates a virtual pet that grows and evolves as users complete focused study sessions, fostering a fun and motivating study environment. Users can also collaborate with friends, share music playlists, and track their progress with personalized analytics..

This project is available on Github
